short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect stock footage from various sources and transfer between your team members.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "Stock Footage Collector", a Chrome extension that allows you to create and share personal collections of stock footage from various websites. With this extension, you can easily collect your favorite stock footage clips from popular websites such as Shutterstock, Getty Images, and many more.

The extension provides an intuitive interface that enables you to add and organize your chosen footage clips into collections that can be easily accessed and shared with others. 

Overall, "Stock Footage Collector" is a must-have tool for anyone who works with stock footage regularly.
